channel.title: DG (nl)
channel.description: Hey I am needing some decent dg partners ( world 67 starting to piss me off ) if your interested pm me on here. State how fast you on average get done with a floor and your level.

item.title: DG (nl)

I suicide for you whenever im free. ;D

item.title: DG (nl)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Loveandpower:

@jc a lot of times the really high level dgers have dged together ever since around 100 dg or so. So they become good friends in the process.

Oh no, when I leech it’s mostly random comp capes together. They don’t know each other. That’s why I posted what I posted before.

Read full topic

item.title: DG (nl)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:27, topic:451684”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=554572.msg4067845#msg4067845 date=1344061191]

My guess is that’s it’s personal preference. I know I would just get confused and mistake doors for others, and end up wasting more time. I’d much rather use some sort of other thing to keep track. (Similar to the tip.it dungeon tracker, but easier to use)

I guess most maxed dungers share the same preference then, just from what I’ve seen.
[/quote]Considering they are obviously a paired group, I wouldn’t even count that as more than one opinion :o So it’s hard to say ‘most’ from that[/quote]

Wait, what do you mean by paired group?

Read full topic

item.title: DG (nl)
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:20, topic:451684”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=554572.msg4067608#msg4067608 date=1344039231]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=554572.msg4067552#msg4067552 date=1344033470]

Not all of those are correct phaze :s

Such as?
[/quote]who seriously takes time to say"rect" etc.

You say crr for crimson rectangle etc

implying people still need to call keys lol
[/quote]you should still call keys. In large dungeons with professional teams/clans they call simply so they know where doors are that needs to be gated etc[/quote]

I can confirm this is far from true. If you are good at dungeoneering you should be able to focus on multiple things at once, that includes watching keys and such. Yes some it is still necessary for the host to usually call what to gate (example; g8 crsh) so the guide isn’t as accurate on that as much in the sense of shortcuts on saying keys, but my point was its still a fairly accurate one. You will usually only catch keys being called for the entire floor on speeds and french worlds

Read full topic

item.title: DG (nl)
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:13, topic:451684”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=554572.msg4066539#msg4066539 date=1343937034]

Eh just hit level 67 and Im getting close to 68. I’ve only ever soloed up to this point, quite a noob at dung. But I get a small dungeon complex 6 done with all monsters killed in about 15-20 minutes. My average is probably about 17-18 right now. I usually rush the lower dungeons on complexity 1 in like 3 1/2 - 4 minutes each.

15-20 minutes for a small c6? O_O You can do those in <2 minutes! Also, don’t kill all the NPCs, it’s less xp/hr, a LOT less.

Meh I did a comparison analysis. I usually finish a small c6 in like 10 minutes if I don’t kill the NPCs. So an extra 5 minutes for 20% more experience seems well worth it.

But isn’t 1exp/10 a better rate than 1.2exp/15? I am 100% sure it’s always better to kill NPC’s only when there’s a GD, etc. You should try it.
[/quote]

GD? :P[/quote]

Guardian door

http://services.runescape.com/m=rswiki/en/Dungeoneering_acronyms

Read full topic
